import { NavLink, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import add from "../assets/images/icons/add.png"; import Button from "../components/Button"; import race from "../components/Races"; import blood from "../components/Blood"; import eyeColor from "../components/EyeColor"; import d√©partement from "../components/Regions"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Publier() { const [successMessage, setSuccessMessage] = useState(""); const initialFormData = { name: "", race: "", sex: "", price: "", location: "", blood: "", diseases_tests: "", id_num: "", eye_color: "", fur_color: "", age: "", qualities: "", flaws: "", free_descriptive_text: "", }; function handleChange(e) { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialFormData); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); axios .post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/offers/offers/", formData, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, }) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); /*setFormData(initialFormData);*/ console.log(successMessage); }) .catch((err) => { console.error(err); }); }; return ( <>
